title: Granite, Air Conditioning, Amazing 1 Bedroom in Beverly Grove
posting_body: ['Unit Availability: September 02, 2022', 'Our beautiful apartment homes are situated in lovely Beverly Grove.', "We are perfectly located only a few blocks from The Beverly Center, Cedars-Sinai, grocery stores such as Trader Joe's, and multiple restaurants such as P.F Chang's, La Paella, and Berri's Café on Third.", 'We offer a variety of different floor plans to suit any need.', 'Select apartment even feature skylights and hardwood style flooring.', 'show contact info', '<URL>/', 'Community Amenities:', '- Laundry Facilities', '- Covered Parking*', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Elevator', 'Apartment Amenities:', '- Skylight*', '- Air Conditioning', '- Patio/Balcony*', '- Disposal', '- Refrigerator*', '- Hardwood Floors*', '- Granite countertops*', '- Large Closets*', '- Stove*', '416 S. Sherbourne/417 S. Holt', 'Los Angeles, CA', '90048', 'Price and availability are subject to change.', '* With Select Apartment Homes.', 'This is an Equal Housing opportunity.', 'Interior Photos may not be of exact unit.', 'Cities: Beverly Hills Adjacent, Beverly Grove, Los Angeles, Beverly Hills, Culver City, West Hollywood']
